                             Immortals (2011)                           
   Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against     
     the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece      
                to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

                         Encoder/Ripper: SMiLE                         
                                                                        
   Ok, source wasn't the best - Was tagged as a "DVDSCR" not sure if    
   it is a true SCR, doesn't really look like one but we've tagged      
   it as one, considering that every other group has. We dropped it     
   in for conversion and just did our usual. We decided to crop the     
   first few lines of subs, including the english subs. There will be   
   one row of subs that pops up every now and again, mostly with the    
   english subs, so the english subs should cover them. We added the    
   english subs (Link Provided By TjKong - Cheers Bro! ) as a track    
   on our MP4, but a little like the subs we did for "The Thing" it     
   glitched out, and may glitch out for you. So we included the .srt    
   file in with the torrent, so we suggest that you use those instead   
   of the sub track. Yes this is still very dark, and the audio can     
   go wild in the loud action scenes, but it's the best source out      
   and better than any of the CAM's and TS's + It's free, so how can    
   you complain. Sample is included. Enjoy! 
